entry.title: about me
entry.summary: Hi, I'm Shadmehr Vasighi and I'm a programmer .To be a programmer mostly just means I enjoy learning new stuff and sometimes: I contribute on some enterprise projects , write some tools and softwares and actually teach my knoledges. I spend a lot of my time learning new technologies around programming and reading famous programmers blogs. I love cooking food - specially pastas - , gardening(i had never done before) ,watching movies ,reading books and riding. I found my interest in computer sciense but i curently study electrical engineering. feel free to ask me for contributing in your open source project Enjoy the site, and please get in touch through any of the links in my header!
entry.content:
Hi, I'm Shadmehr Vasighi and I'm a programmer .To be a programmer mostly just means I enjoy learning new stuff  and sometimes: I contribute on some enterprise projects , write some tools  and softwares and actually teach my knoledges.

I spend a lot of my time learning new technologies around programming and reading famous programmers blogs.

I love cooking food - specially pastas - , gardening(i had never done before) ,watching movies ,reading books and riding.

  • my goodreads page
  • my imdb list
  • look at my plants in instagram   

I found my interest in computer sciense but i curently study electrical engineering.

feel free to ask me for contributing in your open source project

Enjoy the site, and please get in touch through any of the links in my header!
